      • isValidName

        public boolean isValidName(java.lang.String name)
        Inspects the name of the selected worm.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the worm.
        Returns:
        The new name contains no numbers or special characters, starts with an upper case and contains at least two characters. | if ( !name.matches("[a-zA-Z\"\' ]*") && !character.isUpperCase(name.charAt(0) && name.length() < 2 ) return true
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The new name can not contain numbers. | if (name.matches(".*[0-9].*") | throw new IllegalArgumentException("The name can not contain numbers")
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The new name must begin with an upper case. | if (!character.isUpperCase(name.charAt(0))) | throw new IllegalArgumentException("The name must begin with an upper case.")
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The new name must be at least two characters long. | if(name.length() < 2) | throw new IllegalArgumentException("The name must contain at least two characters.)

      • isValidDirection

        public boolean isValidDirection(double direction)
        Inspects the direction of the selected worm.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction of the worm, given as an angle in radians.
        Returns:
        The direction must lay between 0 and 2*PI. | if (direction >=0 && direction <= 2*Math.PI) return true
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The direction is not valid. | if (direction < 0 || direction > 2*Math.PI) | throw new IllegalArgumentException("The direction has to lay between 0 and 2*Pi)

      • isValidRadius

        public boolean isValidRadius(double radius)
        Inspects the radius of the selected worm.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the worm.
        Returns:
        The radius must be at least 0.25 m. | if (radius >= 0.25) return true
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The radius is less than 0.25 m. | if (radius < minimalRadius) | throw new IllegalArgumentException("The radius must be at least 0.25 m.")

      • isValidMass

        public boolean isValidMass(double mass)
        Inspects the mass of the selected worm.
        Parameters:
        mass - The mass of the worm.
        Returns:
        The mass must be valid, so it has to be positive. | if (mass > 0) return true
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - | if (mass <= 0) | throw new IllegalArgumentException("The mass of the worm has to be positive.");

      • calculateMass

        public double calculateMass(double radius)
        Calculates the mass of the selected worm.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the selected worm.
        Returns:
        The new mass of the selected worm. | new.mass = wormDensity * ((4/3) * Math.PI * Math.pow(radius, 3))
